name: Minipreneur - An Entrepreneurship Simulator?
description:
This is the product of me and Aika (@Aikansei)'s effort to the Jamulator 2021.

Play as a small kid who really wants a toy from the arcade and will do everything in his powers to get it!

Gameplay is simple, just click to get ingredients and then make your own sandwiches.

If the browser version is stuttering, feel free to download the windows or linux downloadable versions! :)

PS.: Kids are talkative, use that information to maximize your earnings. :)

If you guys enjoyed this little game, please consider supporting us through here or our patreon page!
